Method Summary
 void focusChanged(boolean focused)
          This method will inform about focus changes (only actual focus changes will be fired in case "isListenGlobalChange" returns false and all focus changes otherwise)
 java.awt.Component getTrackedComponent()
          Tracked component
 boolean isListenGlobalChange()
          Listen to any focus change that happens, not only this component focus changes
 boolean isTrackingEnabled()
          Should tack the provided component or not (can be used to switch off focus tracking when its not needed to optimize overall performance)
 boolean isUniteWithChilds()
          Should count component and its childs as a single focus owner (in case this returns true - any focus change between component and any of its childs will be ignored)
 void setComponent(java.awt.Component component)
           
 void setTrackingEnabled(boolean trackingEnabled)
